China: Mongol conquest of the Song dynasty: The Mongol Empire invaded Song.
Italy: Dante Alighieri is born. He is considered the father of the Italian language for writing works in his dialect, which would become standardized into Modern Italian.
Spain: The Siete Partidas, a code of law, was completed in Castile. Conquest of Murcia (1265–66): James the Conqueror entered Muslim-held territory in support of the Castilian suppression of the Mudéjar revolt.
